summary: The Alan Reinstein Ban Asbestos Now Act of 2025 aims to amend the Toxic Substances Control Act to prohibit the manufacture, processing, use, and distribution of commercial asbestos and its mixtures/articles.  It defines commercial asbestos, outlines exemptions for the chlor-alkali industry and national security, and mandates reporting and Federal Register publication of exemptions. The bill's intent is to ban asbestos and regulate its presence in various products.
